text.div:
Results Coded Values Laboratory (GPS) - IPS

This Value set is defined as the union of: (a) ABO and Rh group [Type] in Blood (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.51); (b) Presence/Absence Indicators (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.52) (c) Organisms (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.49)

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/lab-blood-abo-rh-grp-gps-uv-ips
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/lab-absence-presence-gps-uv-ips
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/organism-gps-uv-ips

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:
